Table of contents

Packages

eric7 Package implementing the eric Python IDE.

Modules

cleanupSource Script for eric to clean up the source tree.
compileUiFiles Script for eric to compile all .ui files to Python source.
create_windows_links Installation script for the eric IDE and all eric related tools.
install Installation script for the eric IDE and all eric related tools.
install-debugclients Installation script for the eric debug clients.
install-dependencies Installation script for the eric IDE dependencies.
install-i18n Installation script for the eric IDE translation files.
setup Module to prepare a distribution package for uploading to PyPI.
uninstall Uninstallation script for the eric IDE and all eric related tools.
uninstall-debugclients Unnstallation script for the eric debug clients.
